SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.WrhsVhclMapper.selectWrhsVhcl */ WV.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WV.VHCLNO AS VHCLNO , WV.DRVR_NM AS DRVR_NM , WV.BANK_CD AS BANK_CD , WV.ACTNO AS ACTNO , WV.DPSTR AS DPSTR , WV.RMRK AS RMRK , WV.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , TO_CHAR(WV.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT FROM TB_WRHS_VHCL_INFO WV WHERE WV.APC_CD = #{apcCd}
AND WV.VHCLNO LIKE '%' || #{vhclno} || '%'

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT , pt0.* FROM (
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.WrhsVhclMapper.selectWrhsVhclList */ WV.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WV.VHCLNO AS VHCLNO , WV.DRVR_NM AS DRVR_NM , WV.BANK_CD AS BANK_CD , WV.ACTNO AS ACTNO , WV.DPSTR AS DPSTR , WV.RMRK AS RMRK , WV.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , TO_CHAR(WV.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT FROM TB_WRHS_VHCL_INFO WV WHERE WV.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WV.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND WV.VHCLNO LIKE '%' || #{vhclno} || '%'
) pt0 OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY
